          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Television News 1</string>
            <string language="en">Television News 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehen-Nachrichten 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelles 1 De Télévision</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia 1 Da Televisão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie 1 Della Televisione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεοπτικές ειδήσεις 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noticias 1 De la Televisión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">We all watch the news on television - breakfast news, nine o'clock news local news - but have you thought about how the news is shaped and manipulated?Modul 5 - Media.Ingår i Engelska B - CFL.</string>
            <string language="en">We all watch the news on tele vision - breakfast news, nine o ' clock news local news - but have you thought about how the news ice shaped wild duck manipulated?

Module 5 - the mediums.

Is included in English B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Engelska B</string>
            <string language="sv">engelska</string>
            <string language="sv">English B</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>
            <string language="sv">media</string>
            <string language="sv">television</string>
            <string language="sv">television news</string>
            <string language="en">English B</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">English B</string>
            <string language="en">english</string>
            <string language="en">the mediums</string>
            <string language="en">tele vision</string>
            <string language="en">tele vision news</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alle wir überwachen die Nachrichten auf 
Teleanblick - Frühstücknachrichten, neun O ' Taktgeber-Nachrichten 
lokale Nachrichten - aber lassen Sie denken an, wie das Nachrichten 
Eis wildes Ente manipulated?Module 5 - das mediums.Is eingeschlossen 
in englischem B - CFL formte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous tous observons les nouvelles sur la vision 
télé- - nouvelles de petit déjeuner, nouvelles locales de nouvelles
d'horloge de neuf o '- mais vous faisons penser à la façon dont la 
glace de nouvelles a formé le manipulated?Module sauvage 5 de canard 
- le mediums.Is inclus dans B anglais - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós todos prestamos atenção à notícia na 
visão tele - notícia do pequeno almoço, notícia local da notícia 
do pulso de disparo de nove o ' - mas temo-lo pensado sobre como o 
gelo da notícia deu forma ao manipulated?Module selvagem 5 do pato - 
o mediums.Is incluído em B inglês - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutti guardiamo le notizie sulla visione tele - 
notizie della prima colazione, notizie locali di notizie dell'orologio
di nove o '- ma li facciamo pensare a come il ghiaccio di notizie ha 
modellato il manipulated?Module selvaggio 5 dell'anatra - il 
mediums.Is incluso in B inglese - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλοι προσέχουμε τις ειδήσεις στο τηλε όραμα - 
ειδήσεις προγευμάτων, εννέα ο "ειδήσεις ειδήσεων ρολογιών 
τοπικές - αλλά εσείς για το πώς ο πάγος ειδήσεων διαμόρφωσε την
άγρια πάπια manipulated?Module 5 - τα μέσα συμπεριλαμβάνονται 
στο αγγλικό β - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Todos miramos las noticias en la visión tele - 
noticias del desayuno, noticias locales de las noticias del reloj de 
nueve o ' - pero le hacemos pensar de cómo el hielo de las noticias 
formó el manipulated?Module salvaje 5 del pato - el mediums.Is 
incluido en B inglés - CFL.</string>
          </description>
